main.title: Setup server
main.description: Search your network to find your evcc installation.

search.notAvailable: The search is not possible on this device. Use the manual input.

manually.serverNotAvailable: Server not available. Please check the address.
manually.checkAdress: The server does not appear to be an evcc instance. Please check the address.
manually.serverIncompatible: The evcc instance is not yet app-compatible. Update your installation.
